mainText:
I so fondly remember my first Apple product. I drove frantically 70 miles
after work one day to the Keystone Apple Store in Indianapolis just to
purchase my first Apple computer - a PowerBook G4.

I waited first in line on campus for the release of Panther throughout Snow
Leopard. I couldn't wait to see each WWDC. Every release was so exciting.

I enjoy all technology, but there has been something really special about
the last few years and Apple.

I never knew you, but felt close. I'll miss you Steve.
author: Weldon
